Name: Doremi
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: MIST chilled glass with Becherovka and set aside. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into misted glass.
History: Lithuanian Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail Legacy 2015 winning drink by Algirdas Mulevicius at Trinity in Vilnius.
Nutrition: One serving of Doremi contains 182 calories
